member.name: T:Moyca.Database.DatabaseClient
member.summary: Class DatabaseClient: Provides all Moycan specific DynamoDB databases with a common utility for queries, scan's, and getItems.

members.member: Accessor for a specific entry in the database @param primaryKey the key used to lookup the entry in the database
Accessor for a specific entry in the database @param primaryKey the key used to lookup the entry in the database
Edits an attribute of an item in the database @param updateRequest - request to update DB with, generated by child class

member.name: T:Moyca.Database.DictionaryDB
member.summary: Class DictionaryDB: For accessing the dictionary database for retrieving words and for handling any changes to the scope and sequence and dictionary word additions.

member.name: P:Moyca.Database.DictionaryDB.TableName
member.summary: Required to access dictionary in dynamoDB, cannot be changed.

member.name: P:Moyca.Database.DictionaryDB.PrimaryPartitionKey
member.summary: Represents collumn name in dynamoDB for accessing unique keyed words.

member.name: F:Moyca.Database.DictionaryDB.keyCondition
member.summary: All global secondary indexes use this condition to access content by query.

member.name: P:Moyca.Database.DictionaryDB.MaxWordCount
member.summary: For queries that produce more words than required by a session, limit to 10.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.DictionaryDB.GetWordsToReadWithOrder(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Retrieves words from dictionary based on order provided by scope-and-sequence. Must be awaited to ensure dynamoDB response is aquired. A Key Value Pair of: Dictionary order = {{WF, "at"}, {CVC, TRUE}}; This will grab all words from dictionary that are in the "at" family and a consonant-vowel-consonant.
member.param: Key is lesson type mapped to lesson value.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.DictionaryDB.FilterWord(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,Amazon.DynamoDBv2.Model.AttributeValue},System.String@)
member.summary: The global secondary index can only query one column in table. When the requirement for additional filtering exist, this will reduce the database item based on additional filters.
member.param: one item with all collumn attributes retrieved from dynamoDB
filter produces null if this item does not meet filter requirements.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.DictionaryDB.GenerateQuery(Moyca.Database.GlobalConstants.GlobalIndex,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the query paylod that is sent to AWS dynamoDB. The query is based on a Global index which is more effient than database scan. The projected expression ensures only Word, VowelType, Vowel, and syllables are retrieved.
member.param: interface that contains the propery global index name

member.name: T:Moyca.Database.GlobalConstants.MODE
member.summary: Determined by scope and sequence to tell FlashCardService which lesson to teach or assess word to read.

member.name: T:Moyca.Database.GlobalConstants.STATE
member.summary: Internal state machine for keeping track of which intent should be executed.

member.name: T:Moyca.Database.GlobalConstants.SKILL
member.summary: Will determine the method to which Alexa will teach the lesson with. Only used in Teach mode.

member.name: T:Moyca.Database.GlobalConstants.GlobalIndex
member.summary: Interface Global Index: All databases with a global secondary index must implement an index name, partition key, and sort key. These exact values can be found in DynamoDB.

member.name: T:Moyca.Database.GlobalConstants.Filter
member.summary: Class Filter: To provide additional filters based on desired vowel types, vowels, and syllable counts.

member.name: T:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB
member.summary: Class LiveSessionDB: For accessing the live-session database. Used primarily by FlashCardService to populate live-session with session data to ensure lambda function follow servless design criteria.

member.name: P:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.AppReady
member.summary: Indicates if Unity application is running, is set by Unity application and known through live-session database

member.name: P:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.TeachMode
member.summary: Alexa can currently teach or assess using words to read.

member.name: P:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.State
member.summary: live-session state machine

member.name: P:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.Skill
member.summary: The common-core skill Alexa is currently teaching to.

member.name: P:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.CurrentSchedule
member.summary: Four digit index value that corresponds with scope and sequence database.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes live session data base with uniqe userID.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.UpdateLiveSession
member.summary: Updates live-session with current state and variables. Must be awaited to ensure response from AWS dynamo.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.GetDataFromLiveSession
member.summary: Populates object variables from live-session database. Must be awaited to ensure response from AWS dynamo.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the current word from local variable, NOT FROM DATABASE.
member.returns: true if words to read list is empty, indicating successful completion of session.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.GetCurrentWord
member.summary: Gets current word by looking at index 0 of wordsToRead.

member.name: M:Moyca.Database.LiveSessionDB.GetWordsRemaining
member.summary: Get the amount of words left to read. Used by unity to populate progress bar.
member.returns: The string amount after converted from int.
